RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.HEC_id,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.identifier,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.time_start,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.time_end,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.freq_start,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.freq_end,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.dyn_spec,wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst.comment FROM wind_stereo_ii_iv_radioburst WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: identifier
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An internal WAVES Experiment Type II/IV event identifier, which, as the events are organised in separate files for each year, is incremented for each event during the year and reset to 1 at the start of the next year.

FIELD.name: dyn_spec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Dynamic spectra type:Those marked with 'S' or 'X' are standard frequency versus time dynamic spectra.Those marked with 'F' are inverse frequency versus time, corresponding roughly to distance from the sun versus time.

FIELD.name: comment
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments -brief description of type of burst.
